text: 20-20 Bn $ import. 13 -15Bn $ Export. They used to cover up the difference using the forex gained from tourism. When that dropped, everything gone out of control. There are  only 2 ways. Either decrease imports and save forex drain. OR increase exports and gain more Forex. Until that happens. no matter how much money is given as aid / loan, they will reach back to square 1 after a few months. This issue was already there ever since korean war but everyone pretended like its manageable.

text:
Among the many noises and dramas, the core point should not get lost.

- India will bail out colombo 
In return , India will  secure its  political, economical and geopolitical interest's. 
May not get involved in local tamil , sinhala politics.

- Federal or an out right Eelam, our aim is to recover from the negative impact caused by genocide,  to create a  secular  , happy, prosperous and a responsible society . 
Not to wage a war with sinhalese or for that matter with anyone.

-Rule of law is supreme, not Sharia law. 
muslims never asked the Sinhalese to implement their sharia law in the areas they are majority 

- out right Eelam??
India's position could change at the last minute in support of Eelam depending on many things. 
Secret agreements have already been signed between delhi and Colombo.  To sone extent, Indias concerns should be considered.  Ie, Russia invaded Ukraine to put an stop to the NATO expansion.

- The danger of Army taking over is a real possibilities., The question is when, after or before the bail out, 
after or before the pakshas go to jail for all sorts including the crimes committed during the war.

- India and china are not really enemies. In the case of Srilanka, they will work together to keep the US and the west away.

- We must have the power to formulate our own fiscal and monetary policies. 
Sinhalese cannot be trusted, and top of it, its ridiculous to ask the Tamils to pay for the war debt.

- Srilanka s external debt is $$$ 51 billion, Internal debt could be higher . Amounting to more than 100 billion$$$. 
Srilanka will be a slave country for an other 100 -200 years , we don't want to be part of it. In the internal debt , money could be owed to Rajapakse enterprise, Ranil & Co Ltd and to  the Maha sanga Mahathayas Plc.

- we must have an exit point , if and when the Sinhalese wants to wage a war with india. We dont want to take part in it  Since sinhalese may not pay back the money owed to India.

- If india retake katchatheevu, we must demand an out right independent Eelam without any reservations. Its a sign, India dont trust Colombo any longer , India may not reject the Idea of independent Eelam.

- If the US support us to form an independent Eelam, it should go to a referendum.
Out right Eelam or a federal set up in the NE  is the result of sinhalese"s  fault. 
Not India"s,  
even thou india has been an adversary all along . We must understand this point clearly.
At the same time , We dont want to fight a war with india, if a war breaks out between the US and India.

-Sinhalese need to accept that they fought a wrong war and died for the wrong reasons.  Karma.

- If the Sinhala political parties arent supportive of a meaningful political solution, we must make an appeal to the  IMF  against a bail out package for Srilanka at the earliest. Need to be tested before the money flow. 
Tamil perspective.

text:
Im writing the Tamil"s  political and economical  future with the view,
That the..

-
The 21st century story will be all about money not based on territory or religion, Even thou, its all interlinked with one an other. 

- A racist country with its racist policies could invade a rich country which doesn't share the same religious belief as the invading one.

- The war machines and human meat grinders will go where the money is..

- The Z symbol displayed on all the Russians military machines and meat grinders in Ukraine , means money and money market.

- More wars are on the way....
Its a matter of time the US federal bank increase its interest rates, soon after that, many more countries will find their place along with srilanka. Things dont happen over night.

In this 21st century story...

Any powers that win the heart of india will win the champion of the 21st century,

Equally, the powers  that break up India into pieces will also win the champion of the 21st century.

 It can even be the same powers would want to win the heart of india  , would also want to break up India,

A 3rd world war may not take place until the powers have found a habitable planet  out side our solar system, may be they already have found one.

text: Developing Sri Lanka is not a big issue if proper professionals with knowledge, skills, industry experience, potential and proven track records are appointed. The political mafia with frauds and foolish politicians mismanagement has driven sri lanka to this situation. Sri Lankan living abroad has taken their decisions not to transfer their foreign earnings to sri lanka until Gota Go Home and good governance is established. But President is only worried about securing their frauds allegations and not ready to step down no matter what happens to the country! So the current situation is worse and future is going to be terrible!                                                                                                  Sri Lanka has enough resources within the country, huge potential of exports and services, skilled and educated work force, no shortage of experts and etc. There are huge potential of exports revenue through IT sector as we have best IT professionals, well educated work force to earn foreign remittance, great potential of skilled apparel industry work force to earn export income from apparels, great potential of earning from sea ports as sri lanka locates at worlds best shipping routes, Sri lanka sea is under utilized for harnessing fishing, center in asia for airport services as well, sri lanka sea has huge reserves of unexploited gas and crude oil, world best quality graphite, abundant of minerals such as ilmenite, rutile, zircon, quartz and etc, we have tropical climate through out the year with most suited rainfalls for cultivations including tea, rubber, coconut, spices, cashew and etc, we have world best gem stone mines, sri lanka is the best country for tourism in the world with highest bio diversity, etc. There are so many other earning potentials and each sector has the potential of multi billion revenues.                                                                               Unfortunately politicians have no knowledge to harness the potential of this country! This is the main issue. What sri lanka really need is a political system which ensure suitable qualified professionals to be selected to government top positions more than foreign aids as we can stand up high if this is done by eradicating political mafia! Who ever comes to help sri lanka should not just provide unconditional laons to the government and let them engage in more frauds and put the country into further deep problem but first establish the good governance and then provide the loan aids!

I would like to see More Information on Taxation (& Debt)...
but, maybe having a 9% Sales Tax would be good.

4% to Sri lanka, 3% to State/Provinces & 2% for Towns/Cities...

(where I live 6.5% State & 1.25% for Town/Cities) 

Sales Tax should be basically #1 source of Revenue, Property #2, Income Tax #3 & Tariffs/other #4.


Also, No Reductions for Corporations & +10% < 15%  Electricity Costs over Residential.

Plus, Eliminate Any General Fuel & Energy Subsidies..  only Gov. Assistance for individuals.


{bonds held by Pensions, States & personal/Citizen holdings >$100k (usd) exchange @ 250>300:$1 -- with a General Forex exchange of 300:$1 > 400:$1..
